Name: Sky Drop
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: Thunder / Twister / Sky Uppercut / Gust / Hurricane / Smack Down. Flinch Target. If Target is Flying-Type or too heavy to carry, this Move fails. See Strength chart on p. 532.
Description: The Pok√©mon clutches their foe and starts flying up high, then drops the foe from a decent altitude. Let gravity handle this one.
